FooterContent.text1: NFT marketplace UI created with Anima for Figma.
FooterContent.text4: Get exclusive promotions & updates straight to your inbox.

WorksContent.title: How it works
WorksContent.description: Find out how to get started
WorksContent.cardText1: Set up your wallet of choice. Connect it to the Animarket by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.
WorksContent.cardText2: Upload your work and setup your collection. Add a description, social links and floor price.
WorksContent.cardText3: Choose between auctions and fixed-price listings. Start earning by selling your NFTs or trading others.
